Find the missing length of a triangle using the sine function

[imath] \mathrm{SOHCAH} \mathrm{TOA} [/imath]\n[imath]\begin{array}{l}\n\sin \theta=\frac{\text { op }}{\text { hyp }} \cos \theta=\frac{\text { adj }}{\text { hyp }} \quad \text { math-worksheet. ory } \\\n\qquad \tan \theta=\frac{\text { opp }}{a d j}\n\end{array}[/imath][imath]\sin \theta=\frac{\text { op }}{\text { hyp }} \cos \theta=\frac{\text { adj }}{\text { hyp }} \quad \text { math-worksheet. ory } [/imath] [imath]\qquad \tan \theta=\frac{\text { opp }}{a d j}[/imath]
